https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6bQraeWZBhRmttw3PJxM1zFJRFb.jpg After arriving in the small Pacific Northwestern town of Bright Falls, reporter Jake Fischer is plagued by blackouts and finds disturbing evidence of his activities. Tying this to a mysterious epidemic sweeping the town, he plans an escape. Prequel to the game Alan Wake. Bright Falls
